activities.description: Start your day at Morso Cafe (Nordendstraße 17, 80799 München) for specialty coffee and a cozy atmosphere.

Visit Cafe Lotti (Schleißheimer Str. 13, 80333 München), a charming pastel-colored cafe with locally sourced dishes. Explore Lost Weekend Cafe (Schellingstraße 3, 80799 München), known for its artistic vibe and aromatic coffee.
Take a short walk to the English Garden, a large public park perfect for a peaceful stroll.
Revisit the English Garden if the weather permits, or explore indoor attractions like the BMW Welt (Am Olympiapark 1, 80809 München) to admire luxury cars.
Head to Olympiapark (Spiridon-Louis-Ring 21, 80809 München) for scenic views and potential indoor activities.
Enjoy a relaxing evening at a nearby cafe or restaurant.
Spend your last morning revisiting your favorite spots or exploring the Viktualienmarkt, a famous food market in Munich.
Wrap up your trip with a final coffee at one of the recommended cafes.

weather_advice.forecast: Light rain is expected throughout the trip (10.4°C, 95% humidity).
weather_advice.clothing: Wear waterproof clothing, comfortable walking shoes, and carry an umbrella or raincoat.
weather_advice.activity_adjustments: Consider indoor activities like visiting museums or shopping if the rain is heavy.

transportation_advice: Walking is feasible for most locations, but bring rain gear to stay comfortable.
